#summary Adaptive Roughing operation

= Introduction =

1. Make a solid, for example a cone, press

http://heekscad.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/bitmaps/cone.png


2. Make an adaptive roughing operation, press

http://heekscnc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/bitmaps/adapt.png


3. Make the Python script, press

http://heekscnc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/bitmaps/python.png


4. Create the NC code and see the toolpath, press

http://heekscnc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/bitmaps/postprocess.png


There will be some toolpath, probably not what you expect.
If there is no toolpath, have a look in the terminal ( if running Linux ) to see if there are any Python script errors, like you haven't built.
